sentences.en: At least two of the three other absentees also had justifiable reasons for being away.
sentences.cn: 其他三个缺席者中至少两个人也有合理的缺席理由。

sentences.en: Even the absentee members would endeavour to return home in time for it.
sentences.cn: 所有大家庭的成员都会聚集一堂,远在他乡的也会尽量赶回来.

sentences.en: He was charged with being an absentee.
The deadline for absentee voting in was Saturday.
sentences.cn: 缺席投票的最后期限是星期六。

sentences.en: The house has an absentee landlord , who visits the property once a year.
sentences.cn: 这栋房子的房主不在这儿住, 一年过来一次.
